transcript:
All at once the stranger closed the book, putting in a marker, and again, leaning with his arms on the back of the sofa, sat in his former position with his eyes shut. Pierre looked at him and had not time to turn away when the old man, opening his eyes, fixed his steady and severe gaze straight on Pierre's face. 
Pierre felt confused and wished to avoid that look, but the bright old eyes attracted him ir- resistibly. 
"I HAVE THE PLEASURE of addressing Count Be- ziikhov, if I am not mistaken
